column2: Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Garl Glittergold, god of gnomes, luck and humour.
Segojan Earthcaller, god of death and earth.
Flandal Steelskin, god of smithing and metalworking.
Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Baervan Wildwanderer, god of nature and travel.
Baravar Cloakshadow, god of illusion and deception.
Gaerdal Ironhand, god of vigilance and defense.
Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Nebelun, god of invention and construction.
Urdlen, god of bloodlust and hatred.
